description: Monitor email gateways usually do not scan internal email, but an organization can leverage the journaling-based solution which sends a copy of emails to a security service for offline analysis or incorporate service-integrated solutions using on-premise or API-based integrations to help detect internal spearphishing attacks.(Citation: Trend Micro When Phishing Starts from the Inside 2017)

external_references.description: Chris Taylor. (2017, October 5). When Phishing Starts from the Inside. Retrieved October 8, 2019.
external_references.source_name: Trend Micro When Phishing Starts from the Inside 2017
